name: intent_inferrer
description: Advanced document analysis and intent inference using LangChain's UnstructuredDirectoryLoader and LangGraph workflow automation

required.name: OPENAI_API_KEY
required.description: OpenAI API key for LLM-based intent generation

optional.name: UNSTRUCTURED_API_KEY
optional.description: Unstructured.io API key for advanced document parsing
optional.benefit: Enables parsing of PDFs, DOCX, PPTX, Excel, emails, and more

optional.name: UNSTRUCTURED_SERVER_URL
optional.benefit: Offline document processing with local server

usage_scenarios.description: Analyze research papers, reports, and documentation to understand research directions and gaps
Understand developer intentions and common use cases from code repositories
Extract insights and action items from business documents and presentations
Analyze email threads and communication patterns for intent discovery

limitations: Large document collections may require significant processing time
Complex document layouts may have parsing variations
Intent quality depends on document content richness and clarity
Advanced document types require Unstructured API or local server setup
Processing timeout may be reached for very large document collections

setup_instructions.basic: Works out of the box with OPENAI_API_KEY for text-based files
setup_instructions.advanced: Set UNSTRUCTURED_API_KEY for full document type support
